parameters: No can do, mate; we're still working on these bridges. Come back later.
We've finished construction on the bridges!

Author: Magnemania
Objectives: Have 4 Spearmen deployed at once (Requires Spearman).
Hit an enemy across the chasm from your main base. (Requires Archer or Rifleman).
Defeat one of the two opponents. (Requires Spearman and Bridges).
